name: D-Money Clicker 1.6 Release | The Bananas Update
name_original: D-Money Clicker 1.6 Release | The Bananas Update
description:
The 1.6 release of D-Money Clicker

This update added the funny Windows XP monkey who can execute a small variety of effects during some very rare chances.

Play on scratch here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/816400096
